definitions.body: sabbath observance, sabbatism;—´[[שׁ]]: Ex 16:23 + 10 t. P; usu. phrase [[שַׁבַּת]] [[שַׁבָּתוֹן]] sabbath of sabbatic observance;—
of weekly sabbath Ex 31:15, Ex 35:2, Le 23:3, Ex 16:23 ([[שַׁבָּתוֹן שַׁבַּת קׂדֶשׁ]], prob. transp.).
sabbatical year Le 25:4; cf. [[שְׁנַת שַׁבָּתוֹן]] v:Le 25:5.
´[[שׁ]]: alone of feast of trumpets Le 23:24, and of first and eighth days of feast of tabernacles v:Le 23:39, v:Le 23:39.
